definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: Many gardeners grow curly parsley as a border for flowerbeds.
sentences.chinese: 很多花園種植皺葉歐芹用來做花圃的邊界。
小蜜蜂歐芹草本抗痘露。

sentences.english: Add salt, pepper, and chopped parsley.
Add in shallots, parsley, egg, flour, salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.chinese: 加入蔥酥，歐芹，雞蛋，麪粉以及適量鹽胡椒。

sentences.english: Add the mushrooms, ham, green pepper, celery, onions and parsley.
sentences.chinese: 加放蘑菇，火腿，綠甜椒，芹菜，蔥和歐芹。

sentences.english: Want dry parsley, oregano, basil, or another herb?
sentences.chinese: 想要乾燥歐芹，牛至，羅勒，或其它藥草？
用芫荽或歐芹和櫻桃裝飾。

sentences.english: McKeith said chewing the parsley after meals is a good way to freshen breath.
sentences.chinese: 麥基斯說在飯後咀嚼歐芹是一個清新口氣的好辦法。

sentences.english: McKeith suggests adding parsley and fennel to the millet for an extra kick.
sentences.chinese: 麥基斯建議在小米中加入歐芹和茴香以增強效果。

sentences.english: Slide out onto plate and sprinkle with feta and parsley.
sentences.chinese: 然後移入盤內，撒上羊奶酪和碎歐芹。

sentences.english: Remove the onion and garlic cloves from the pot, and add the remaining ingredients except the parsley.
sentences.chinese: 從鍋裏聊起洋蔥和蒜，並加入剩餘的材料除了歐芹。

sentences.english: He decorated the chicken with sprigs of parsley.
sentences.chinese: 他用歐芹的嫩枝點綴在雞上。

sentences.english: Dill, parsley and water celery as part of the meal is to use fork edible.
sentences.chinese: 蒔蘿，歐芹和水芹作爲餐食的一部分是要用叉食用的。

sentences.english: Add in diced tomatoes and dry parsley. Flavoured with a little salt.
sentences.chinese: 倒入蕃茄丁，插手歐芹末，插手少許鹽調味。

sentences.english: Sprinkle with parsley. Serve warm in a lettuce-lined bowl.
sentences.chinese: 撒一些歐芹，倒入鋪有生菜葉的大碗中，趁熱食用。

sentences.english: If supplements aren’t your thing, try a little parsley.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不想服用補充品，那麼試着咀嚼一點歐芹。

definition: variant of 西蘭花|西兰花[xi1 lan2 hua1]
